title: Low cost energy will increase aggregate supply

content.question: Which of the following will cause aggregate supply to increase in Country X?

choices.label: An increase in personal income taxes
The discovery of low-cost alternative sources of energy
A decrease in labor productivity with no change in nominal wages
Depreciation of country Xâ€™s currency on the foreign exchange market
An increase in the price level

content.answer: The discovery of low-cost alternative sources of energy

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
